messages.message: I just used the translation app, and it did not translate the entire document (attached). It is hard to fully see with the weird formatting (the already known issue), but it appears to only translate the first page. You can see the bottom of page 1 is correctly translated, and the top of page 2 (and the rest of the document) is not translated.

cc: @jayasooryan.

@ChrisM is this something you were just trying out? Or a potential customer scenario? The doc translation app is "experimental" right now so trying to find the right level of investment to improve these cases
